title: NiziKit Material
description: Schema for NiziKit material definition files (.nizimat.json)

name.description: Unique name identifier for the material

shader.description: Relative path to the shader program JSON file (.nizishp.json)

variants.description: Shader variant defines to select specific shader permutations

albedo.description: Relative path to the albedo/diffuse texture

normal.description: Relative path to the normal map texture

metallic.description: Relative path to the metallic texture

roughness.description: Relative path to the roughness texture
